internal.content:
---
title: XML server
description: XML server
---

As shown in [Deployment architecture](/architecture/cloud-arch/dev-workstation-architecture) a single pod is created for our XML server.

To verify the service name, run the following command:

```shell
kubectl get services
```

The XML server is listed with the name: `releasename-xmlserver` where `releasename` was defined during deployment.

MdxNode.rawBody:
---
title: XML server
description: XML server
---

As shown in [Deployment architecture](/architecture/cloud-arch/dev-workstation-architecture) a single pod is created for our XML server.

To verify the service name, run the following command:

```shell
kubectl get services
```

The XML server is listed with the name: `releasename-xmlserver` where `releasename` was defined during deployment.
